html:
The Event Knowledge Exchange Project

On both practical and theoretical levels, this live event-based module draws on and assesses the knowledge, understanding and skills developed in a number of previous modules by requiring these to be combined and applied, as appropriate, to a specific events context.

Learning Objectives:

+  Employ a range of critical evaluation techniques to demonstrate a systematic awareness, understanding and knowledge of contemporary management issues associated with the event.

+  Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of key planning and research tools sufficient to support the effective organisation of an event.

+  Critically analyse and reflect on learning within the professional context of practical theorising in event management.

+   Plan, develop and manage an event.

+   Reflect upon and evaluate your event management and collaborative skills, research skills and development.

Module Content:
